pT_evidence: This tumor is staged as a pT2NO cancer,
pN_evidence: All 4 lobar and 3 segmental peribronchial lymph nodes negative for tumor.
tumor_stage_evidence: This tumor is staged as a pT2NO cancer, which corresponds to Stage IB according to AJCC7 criteria.
histologic_diagnosis_evidence: Left lower lobe lung lobectomy: Squamous cell carcinoma, moderately differentiated, central.
comment: The pathology report indicates a moderately differentiated squamous cell carcinoma of the left lung with a tumor size of 4.7 cm, invading peribronchial fatty tissue and positive bronchial resection margin involvement. No lymph node metastasis was found in the examined nodes. The staging is pT2a N0 (Stage IB) according to AJCC7 criteria.
